name: $code
desc: The property  value is a code defined in an external code system. This may be used for translations, but is not the intent

name: $Coding
desc: The property value is a string

name: $string
desc: The property value is a string (often used to assign ranking values to concepts for supporting score assessments)

name: $integer
desc: The property value is a boolean true | false

name: $boolean
desc: The property is a date or a date + time
